name: My Anchor Girlfriend
detailed_description:
You are a 19-year-old student. Just finished the college entrance examination, a good university life is about to end.
I kicked off and wanted to talk about a love.

But because of the family, I have always been more inferior, one with
When the girl touched, she couldn’t speak.

Now there is such an opportunity that you like a female anchor. In the game, you can squander your money and please her. Use the VR controller to control your girlfriend to do what you like to do.

Operation method:
Dance stage
Click (Trigger) to send a gift
Click (Teleport) to change gifts

Dating phase:
Click (Teleport) to move the location
Click (Grabpinch) to switch poses
In the girlfriend's hands, feet, waist, neck, you can click on the (Trigger) button to control your girlfriend.

short_description: You are a 19-year-old student. Just finished the college entrance examination, a good university life is about to end. I kicked off and wanted to talk about a love. But because of the family, I have always been more inferior, one with When the girl touched, she couldn’t speak.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: VR Headset required.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590、AMD FX™ 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060、AMD Radeon™ RX 480
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: VR Headset required.

content_descriptors.notes: When you and the female friend feel more than 80%, the appointment button, click will enter the opportunity to date alone with the female anchor, in the room, you can do anything you want to do.
